H0.text: Which land mammal has the longest tail. Lion

H1.text: Which land mammal has the longest tail. Elephant

H2.text: Which land mammal has the longest tail. Leopard

H3.text: Which land mammal has the longest tail. Girafe

A4.text: The 80–100 cm (31–39 in) long tail ends in a long, dark tuft of hair and is used as a defense against insects.
